description: Search application error and critical logs for a specific service within a time window. Returns log messages, timestamps, error codes, and trace IDs to help identify the nature of failures.

configuration.query: FROM resolve-logs | WHERE level IN ("error", "critical") AND service == ?service | WHERE @timestamp >= NOW() - TO_TIMEDURATION(?time_window) | SORT @timestamp DESC | LIMIT 50

service.description: The service name to search logs for (e.g., order-service, payment-service)

time_window.description: How far back to search. Must use full time unit names (e.g., 1 hours, 2 hours, 30 minutes)
